/** * This is a {@link KeyHashingScheme} based on the * <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-2">SHA-256</a> * algorithm. The hashes produced are hex-encoded SHA-256 * digests and hence are always 64-character hexadecimal * strings. */
